description: Footage that has gone viral on the internet shows the unfortunate duo caught in an icy blast at a ski resort in the Damuls-Mellau region of Austria.
title: Alps skiers caught in blast from snow cannon after chairlift stopped in video
title_page: Alps skiers caught in blast from snow cannon after chairlift stopped in video | Daily Mail Online
text:
Two skiers became stranded in the worst possible spot when a chairlift came to a sudden halt at ski resort in the Alps.
This video shot by a fellow skier captured the moment the pair was caught in a man-made storm caused by a snow cannon.
Footage that has gone viral on the internet shows the unfortunate duo, who had no escape, being blasted at a resort in the Austrian province of Vorarlberg.
The unfortunate duo had no escape while being blasted at a resort in the Austrian province of Vorarlberg
The video was shot in the Damuls-Mellau ski region, where the tourists were travelling on a two-seater chairlift up the mountain to get back on the slopes.
Unfortunately for them, the lift stopped temporarily right next to the snow cannon.
Eyewitnesses speaking in German can be heard saying that they cannot believe what they are seeing as the hapless skiers unsuccessfully try to move out of the way of the man-made blizzard.
One witness shouted: ‘Look at that pair!’ and ‘They are soaking wet!’
The chairlift eventually began to move again and the pair moved out of the line of fire (right)
Another added: ‘And now it’s going on again!’
The eyewitnesses said that the tourists were stuck for over a minute in the icy blast.
